short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Jisho.org and can access with a shortcut. Right-click on selected text and choose 'Search Jisho'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Jisho.org and quickly access the results using a keyboard shortcut. Simply select the desired text and click on the 'Search Jisho' option in the right-click menu. A handy tool for anyone learning Japanese!
